attributes.action: change the date at which a MOT is required, should be based on mileage not on 12 months
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: many collectors cars are driven very rarely, therefore the MOT requirement every 12 months seems very excessive when a vehicle only completes a few hundred miles per year. Many are only taken out to car shows which usually benefits a charitable organisation.
